decisions.description: This decision uses what the user selected on the first screen for what they need help with (i.e. the Technology Case Topic field).
decisions.name: Which_topic_does_the_user_need_help_with
decisions.label: Which topic does the user need help with

Flow.description: This flow supports the case submission and workflow to the Technology Department.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The resource pulls the picklist options in the Priority field on Cases.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Priority

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This resource provides the yes/no picklist related to the Want to Provide ROI field.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ProvideROIPicklist

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This resource provides the picklist yes/no if this case is related to a specific record.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: RelatedtoRecord

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This resource provides the picklist values in the Which Salesforce Object field on the Technology Issue Case.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: SalesforceObjectsPicklist

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This resource provides the picklist options from the Technology Case Topic field.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Technology_Case_Topic

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This resource provided the picklist options in the Which Technology System field on the Case.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Technology_System_Picklist

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This resource provides the picklist options in the Your Department field on a Case.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Your_Department_Picklist

Flow.label: Technology Case Submission Form

recordCreates.label: Create Technology Idea Case

recordCreates.name: Create_Technology_Issue_Case

recordCreates.label: Create Technology Question Case

recordLookups.name: Get_RecordType_ID
recordLookups.label: Get RecordType ID

recordLookups.description: This finds the record type ID for Technology Question.
recordLookups.name: Get_RecordType_ID_0
recordLookups.label: Get RecordType ID

recordLookups.description: This finds the record type ID for Technology Question.
recordLookups.name: Get_RecordType_ID_0_0

screens.description: This page asks for the specific details related to the idea.
screens.name: Idea_Details
screens.label: Idea Details

fields.name: Idea_Details_Head
fields.fieldText:
Technology Ideas/Request: Request Details


Here is format we use to collect requirements:


As a < type of user >, I want < some goal > so that < some reason >.


This help the Technology Department understand who, what the goal is, and why. It provides a specific enough yet vague enough so the Technology Department can work with the business to determine the best way to reach the goal.

fields.name: Subject_Idea
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: As_a
fields.fieldText: As a...

fields.name: I_want
fields.fieldText: I want...

fields.name: So_that
fields.fieldText: So that...

fields.name: Provide_ROI
fields.fieldText: Do you want to provide an ROI?

fields.name: ROI_Type
fields.fieldText: What is the primary focus/type of your ROI

fields.name: ROI_Explanation
fields.fieldText: Please provide an explanation of how your ROI will be calculate/determined.

screens.description: This page displays confirmation of the case submissions.
screens.name: Idea_Thank_You_Page
screens.label: Idea - Thank You Page

fields.name: Thank_You_Issue_0
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for submitting your idea.


Your idea/request has been submitted to the Technology Department. They will work with department stakeholders to prioritize and groom the requirements to ensure the best solution is implemented.

screens.description: This page asks for the specific details related to the issue.
screens.name: Issue_Details
screens.label: Issue Details

fields.name: Issue_Details_Head
fields.fieldText:
Technology Issue: Issue Details

Please fill out the following details as specific as you can. The more details you provide will aid the Technology Department to resolve your issue.

fields.name: Subject_Issue
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: The_Issue
fields.fieldText: What is the issue you are experiencing?

fields.name: Steps_to_Replicate
fields.fieldText: What are the steps to replicate the issue?

fields.name: Is_your_issue_related_to_a_specific_record
fields.fieldText: Is your issue related to a specific record?

fields.name: Which_Record_Explanation_Issue
fields.fieldText:
Which Record:


Provide as much detail as possible or the direct link.


Details should include:

  1. Which object : Lead, Opportunity, Contact, Account, Enrollment Record, etc.
  2. Name or email on record
  3. Record number if Invoice or Enrollment Record.

fields.name: Which_Record_Issue
fields.fieldText: Which Record?

screens.description: This page displays confirmation of the case submissions.
screens.name: Issue_Thank_You_Page
screens.label: Issue - Thank You Page

fields.name: Thank_You_Issue
fields.fieldText:
Your Issue Has Been Submitted


Your issue/case has been submitted to the Technology Department. They will get back to you as quickly as possible. Please do not resubmit this issue if it's urgent and you did not set the Priority to High update your case so that Priority is High.

screens.description: This page displays confirmation of the case submissions.
screens.name: Questions_Thank_You_Page
screens.label: Questions - Thank You Page

fields.name: Thank_You_Questions
fields.fieldText:
Your Question Has Been Submitted


Thank you for submitting your question. Verto's Management Team and Technology Department will work to answer your questions has quickly as possible. Please do not resubmit this question, if it's urgent and you did not set the Priority to High update your case so that Priority is High.

fields.name: Technology_Issue_Screen1_0
fields.fieldText:
Technology Idea/Request: Your Information

Please complete this form with as much detail as possible. The Technology Department will work with the primary stakeholders to groom all requests after submission to ensure that everyone is clear on what is to be implemented.

fields.name: What_is_your_department_Idea
fields.fieldText: What is your department?

fields.name: Which_technology_system_is_the_main_focus_of_your_idea
fields.fieldText: Which technology system is the main focus of your idea?

fields.name: New_Update_Form_YesNo
fields.fieldText: Do you need a new form or updates made to an existing form?

fields.name: Which_FormStack_Form_Idea
fields.fieldText: Which FormStack Form

fields.name: Priority_Explanation_Issue_0
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿What is the priority of your issue?


High = Need to have. Mission Critical.


Medium = Nice to have.


Low = Dream. No rush needed.

fields.name: Priority_Idea
fields.fieldText: Priority

fields.name: Technology_Issue_Screen1
fields.fieldText:
Technology Issue: Your Information

Please fill out the following details as specific as you can. The more details you provide will aid the Technology Department to resolve your issue.

fields.name: What_is_your_department_Issue
fields.fieldText: What is your department?

fields.name: Which_technology_system_is_your_issue_related_to
fields.fieldText: Which technology system is your issue related to?

fields.name: Which_Salesforce_Object
fields.fieldText: Which Salesforce Objects?

fields.name: Which_FormStack_Form
fields.fieldText: Which FormStack Form

fields.name: Priority_Explanation_Issue
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿What is the priority of your issue?


High = You cannot move forward with your tasks until it is resolved.


Medium = Important but I can do other tasks while I wait for it to get resolved.


Low = There is a workaround and it does not stop me from doing my job but still needs to be resolved.

fields.name: Priority_Issue
fields.fieldText: Priority

fields.name: Technology_Question_Form
fields.fieldText:
Technology Question:

Please fill out the fields below as specific details as you can. Your question will first route to your management team and if necessary they can escalate it to the Technology Department.

fields.name: What_is_your_department_Question
fields.fieldText: What is your department?

fields.name: Which_technology_system_Question
fields.fieldText: Which technology system?

fields.name: Priority_Explanation_Question
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿What is the priority for you to get your questions answered?


High = You cannot move forward with your tasks until it is answered.


Medium = Important but I can do other tasks while I wait.


Low = Does not stop me from doing any tasks.

fields.name: Priority_Question
fields.fieldText: Priority

fields.name: Subject_Question
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: Your_Question
fields.fieldText: Your Question

fields.name: Is_your_question_related_to_a_specific_record_Question
fields.fieldText: Is your question related to a specific record?

fields.name: Related_Record_Instructions_Question
fields.fieldText:
Which Record:


Provide as much detail as possible or the direct link.


Details should include:

  1. Which object : Lead, Opportunity, Contact, Account, Enrollment Record, etc.
  2. Name or email on record
  3. Record number if Invoice or Enrollment Record.

fields.name: Which_Record_Question
fields.fieldText: Which Record
fields.helpText: Provide as much detail about a record (name, email) or the specific link to the record.

screens.description: This screen will determine what time of Technology Case they are trying to submit.
screens.name: Technology_Case
screens.label: Technology Case

fields.name: Technology_Case_Welcome
fields.fieldText:
This form will walk you through submitting questions, issues, or ideas to the Technology Department.


The more information and details you can provide the better we will be able to support you and exceed your expectations.

fields.name: What_can_we_help_you_with
fields.fieldText: What can we help you with?

variables.description: This stores the ID of the Queue that the case should be assigned to.
variables.name: QueueID

variables.description: This is the id for the record type that supports the Technology Question case.
variables.name: RecordTypeID

variables.description: This variable stores the ID of the user submitting the case.
variables.name: SubmitterID
